title: Garland Ventures LTD Recalls Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editors note: This release has been updated to reflect updated product information. WASHINGTON, May 10, 2016 Garland Ventures LTD, a Garland, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 114,870 pounds of chicken fried rice products that may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures...
